name: Primary Care
description: As a part of the San Francisco Health Network (SFHN), the Maxine Hall Health Center provides adults (aged 18 years and older) the following primary care services: - Management of chronic conditions - Referrals to specialists - Annual physicals - Hospital follow-up - HIV Services
fullDescription: As a part of the San Francisco Health Network (SFHN), the Maxine Hall Health Center provides adults (aged 18 years and older) the following primary care services: - Management of chronic conditions - Referrals to specialists - Annual physicals - Hospital follow-up - HIV Services
whatTheyOffer: As a part of the San Francisco Health Network (SFHN), the Maxine Hall Health Center provides adults (aged 18 years and older) the following primary care services: - Management of chronic conditions - Referrals to specialists - Annual physicals - Hospital follow-up - HIV Services
howToGetIt: Call the mainline for more information.
cost: Accepted health insurances include: Medicare, Medicaid, Healthy Workers, Healthy Kids or Healthy San Francisco
